      • startNextThread

        public static void startNextThread()
        this will start another thread to process the next msg in the queue. returns true if current thread is remoteThread.

      • startedNextThread

        public static boolean sendMessages()

      • sendMessages

        public static boolean sendMessages(boolean b)
        This allows messages from an OARemoteThread to be sent out to clients. By default, any messages generated from an OARemoteThread are not sent.
